column4: Why can't I use networkmanager to change the channel/frequency on my wireless card? :/
I think the channel is set by the hub, not the card
I'm aware, but if I change the channel on the hub, my card won't find it. And I need to change the channel because there are about 4 APs around here...
my guess is the channel you are picking is just not working.  Try some others, see if that works.
